website_summaries.verdict: This arm blaster works best for average height customers. It may not adjust to fit the tallest and shortest people.
pros: Black arm blaster with heavy plastic buckle for clip
Includes quick-release neck strap with foam neck padding
Helps people with bad backs stay balanced
cons: Works better for average height customers
Those under 5' and over 6' may have trouble adjusting to fit

customer_reviews.title: Utter CRAP. Says metal clip but it's PLASTIC, it broke!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this piece of crap. I haven't even removed the label and the weak, s***ty PLASTIC clip came off extremely easy. It says on the label "Heavy Metal Buckle for Clip keeps Belt Secure", however, this is a piece of crap plastic little clip that is NOT metal (see my pics). I will be returning this s*** and will NOT pay return shipping. I was looking forward a good product, but this is s*** just because of that clip. I will return it and buy something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Paid reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the good reviews. However, I just received an email from the company stating they would refund me $10 for a 5 star review. How dishonest! I use reviews to see genuine feedback about the product. Aa for the product itself, I would still give it a 1-2 star rating. The arm rests need to be further back for natural alignment. The way it is now, your arms will sit awkwardly out and forced you to drive this thing into your stomach. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle-Muggle

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made with small imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seems to be pretty sturdy, I went up to 60lb dumbells for 5 reps each arm and no issues Cons: Neck padding seems very thin Adjustment clip concerns me if I plan on using curl bar with more weight but I'll try and see Overall a great buy and held up to the workout I put it through on it's first use. EDIT: After using it for 2 days last week I noticed the rivets that hold the band around the bar are loose ( I can spin them freely with my finger). It held up with 95 lbs barbell curls but I emailed RAD International to see if this is normal or not; waiting for a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Leaves Your Arms Bulging! Well Built!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this Arm Blaster because I looked at many different ones on Amazon and read their reviews. But once I received this arm blaster I had to use it to see if it really was worth all the hype. It definitely is! After using this arm blaster for the first time and every single time after that, my arms are bulging because of the insane isolation that comes from this Arm Blaster. This is the one to buy! This arm blaster is super sturdy and doesn't bend. The quick length adjustment is super convient and works like a charm. I am extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hier

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, this thing blew me away. That curved plate that does most of the work? Yeah that's 1/4" thick solid steel. I definitely wasn't expecting that, but there it was. The downside is that the buckle that holds that beautiful plate in place is plastic, and seems to pop open at the slightest pressure, but maybe that's a safety feature? It isn't comfortable (and isn't really supposed to be), with some weight on the dumbbells, it definitely constricts your breathing ability while in use, but it 100% does the job that it claims, that beefy steel plate will not let your elbows break the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for back pain sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a few of these on Amazon and was worried because of other types and thier reviews. If you are reading this. This is the one to buy! Doesn't bend, love the semi-gloss to flat finish, and the quick length adjustment. Extremely happy with this purchase Post Work-Out: My arms are bulging. It hits an area that you just don't get from normal bicep curls. On top of that, I did a full workout and had zero back pain, this helps you not strain your back. Not to mention, this is amazing for isolating your arms when you do tricep pulldown's.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Steve

customer_reviews.title: Step up your arm game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this arm baster to step up the intensity of my arm workout and it definitely does that. With this arm blaster, you are putting more focus on the biceps / triceps because you limit shoulder movement. The quality of the RAD arm blaster is really great and has a great feel. I would definitely recommend this arm blaster to anyone who is looking to step up their arm workouts and at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael lavanier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: If you want big biceps there probably no better way to get them than this gadget. Easy to use. Metal frame and nylon straps make it sturdy and, I'm guessing durable. I've been using mine daily for a couple months and I just toss it around, yet it's no worse for the wear.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Arm Blaster
customer_reviews.text: I remember these from my youth. Purchased one for my son; it's awkward to use. Maybe if used with a weight belt on it might be better, but the pressure it places on your gut is unbelievable. My son is thin and it squeezes every little ounce of fat he has on his stomach out below the bar. It's very awkward, and doesn't encourage anyone to use it. Also no instruction. The contraption itself is exactly as it looks online, I think it will work great as designed, maybe we're not using it correctly. Again no instructions, so it's difficult to figure out where exactly it should be placed; higher as opposed to lower.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Arm Blasting Indeed
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Leaves your biceps pumped up!! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shiro

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was willing to try this for a while but I kept forgetting to buy it. Finally I bought it and I'm blown away! I can really feel how this isolate your biceps and help you have the perfect biceps curl! It's too early for me to know if I'll get great results but my guts tell me that I'll have from the feeling I'm getting of working out with this simple but amazing piece of equipment! I advise everybody to get it and try! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Hurts So Good
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! It allows me more reps and really protects my shoulders from injury. I used it yesterday and today my arms feel like they were beaten by a baseball bat. I do heavy curl bar and dumb bells once or twice a week and I haven't been this sore in a LONG time. A lot of reviews saying the clip is weak and it broke. For me it's my upper abdomen (just below my pecs) that is supporting most of the pressure, not the clip. I'd hate to see it break on me too but so far it seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Fer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The neck strap pad rips off almost immediately. The elbow area pads on the bar are cut unevenly and the adhesive is smeared all over. Very cheap product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Will work for most average size people
customer_reviews.text: Provides great isolation for bicep but be warned it doesn't fit everyone. We utilize this equipment in a commercial/employees only gym. We have a lady that is about 4'9" and this thing can't even adjust to fit her.
customer_reviews.author: Queenof Spade

customer_reviews.title: Best armblaster for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Received product in a timely manner. It is made of great quality and doesn't hurt my body like past armblaster said I have used. It has held up so far, I've used up to 70 pound barbells and it hasn't had a problem supporting me during my workout. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jill P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Curls
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of exercise equipment that I bought for my son. He has been working out for some time and wanted this for his birthday and once he used it immediately felt its effects. It totally isolates and makes your curls much more effective. I've tried it myself and found myself dropping down to smaller weights because if forced me to follow the proper form. I highly recommend this anyone who either is a gym enthusiast or new to working out. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: A bit wider and good grip cushions at the elbow bend. Really nice finish and graphics too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Welch

customer_reviews.title: Bicep Blowout!
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is supposed to - isolate your biceps during upright curls. You use this with multiple sets, beware because arm pump is a guarantee. The beck padding is a nice feature. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Martinsen

customer_reviews.title: NECK PADDING IS WRONG
customer_reviews.text: This item is shown with a thick, oval neck pad that looks very comfortable. It DID NOT come with the neck pad as shown on Amazon in magnified view on the red, black and other colors. I am very disappointed. This is false advertising and unlike Amazon products. I would like them to send me the PAD that is pictured in the Amazon ad.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Why I brought the Rad Arm Blaster.
customer_reviews.text: I used the RAD Arm Blaster for building my biceps. My biceps were very swollen after a few sets. Great equipment. Every person that works out should own one. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Edd

customer_reviews.title: Fitness
customer_reviews.text: I love it is awesome!!! My arms balance is easier to work out thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.. Want bigger arms get this product.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to anyone who is trying to focus on building your biceps with good form. I have used it for just a few weeks and I can already see the changes in my arms. The product arrived quickly and was very high quality. I not only recommend this product but I also recommend RAD in general. I am going to look and see what out products they have to help me with my fitness goals. Thanks RAD....
customer_reviews.author: Todd L Steiner

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you want great arms
customer_reviews.text: This has been the greatest addition to my bicep workout. It isolates the bicep and so that you are not swinging and reduces ego lifting. The padding for the elbows were slightly thin and could be better, but my biggest complaint would be the strap around the neck. When tightening and loosening the tie down slips and during the workout can be very annoying, but for the price it serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. Very comfortable compared to others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Very comfortable compared to others I have tried. It's very sturdy and does it job by not allowing me to cheat reps. It allows full stretch of the bicep without pain above the elbow. It arrived flawless. Its also comfortable. I thought it was bent the wrong way at the ends at first but once I adjusted the neck strap it was perfect. The only addition I would add is more padding where the elbow rests in the curves.
customer_reviews.author: Tara & Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Arnold had one, so I had to have one! Does exactly what it is designed to do, isolate the bicep and tricep muscles. Comfortable and easily adjustable. I haven't owned it for very long but the design and usage so far, makes me believe it will last for years! If you are always in the search for a preacher curl rack or have trouble isolating your biceps or triceps I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improve arm workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my workout gear. In the last two weeks ive had it I've signigicantly improved the amount of bicep curls i can perform at the gym. I went from curling 30s to now curling 45s. I perform 4 sets of 15 with 30 lb weights before bed every night. I would reccommend This piece to everyone looking to improve their bicept strength
customer_reviews.author: Javier Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved
customer_reviews.text: They obviously don't make them like they use to. Weider had the blue print on this item. The humerus is to far forward causing much pressure on the sternum.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Watson

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 5 so far only because the parts where you rest your arms digs into the back of my tricep, I have adjusted the strap to lower and heighten the arm blaster but it still seems to dig into the backsides of my arms
customer_reviews.author: Bridger K

customer_reviews.title: Blast off!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built to last! Great manufacturing and perfect size for me. Used a buddies before I bought this that was too small and narrow and ended up causing me pain, but this arm blaster or perfect for those with a broader chest. Will recommend this product to all that ask!
customer_reviews.author: ANdrew

customer_reviews.title: Great arm support
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try it out. Received Arm Blaster in the USPS mail on my work out day. I used it with Zottman Curls and I am surprised. This works very well. Haven't tried it out with other weight training regimen. Great arm support. Good stability. Thanks Amazon, Roger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arm blaster = gainz!
customer_reviews.text: Standing curls have always been a staple when trying to achieve the almighty pump. But if your gym is anything like mine the preacher curl is always held up by the lazy gym douche trying to get the perfect angle for his snatch-chat. With the arm blaster your no longer waiting in line to achieve the insane pump of strict form/full range of motion curls as it goes where you go! Show the gym your alpha AF and get yourself one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came fast tracking was easily to follow love my arm blaster just right
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: RAD Arm Blaster is LEGIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The RAD Arm Blaster does incredible isolation work for the biceps! I've worked them constantly before with a variety of other isolation workouts and can't ever seem to get that "feel good" soreness from the workout. After I used it, I definitely felt it the following day and even more the day after! I'm definitely bringing this on my next deployment and show off the new guns to the wife when I return home! Can't wait to see more results!!! The shipping was absolutely perfect! It showed up right on time for arm day! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Duston peralez

customer_reviews.title: Short for a tall guy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product but at 6'3" the strap provided is a little short probably my mistake as I did not read product descriptions before ordering but overall it is a well made product just have to get a longer strap
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This product is very helpful in isolating the bicep, ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful in isolating the bicep, as a find that performing curls without the support tends to direct the strain towards the deltoid instead of where I want it focused. It makes quite the difference when I am performing curls with free weights..
customer_reviews.author: fred siko

customer_reviews.title: Does the biceps WONDERS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tool to utilize when trying to blast those biceps. Similar to a preacher curl machine, but requires more core to perform properly thus giving a better workout overall. I implement this in every back/bicep workout to maximize the gains! Lifters and Non-lifters need to buy one. The quality of this is extremely sturdy compared to competition brands i've tried in the past. MUST Buy! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I've got small man syndrome, and this is just what I needed to have better form while doing curls. The metal plate has been solid and has kept its form without bending although I haven't loaded more that 100 lbs total on the curl bar yet. As I do my curls on national bench press and curl day (aka Mondays) I don't have any complaints about this arm blaster. The pad on the strap does seem a little thin but so far it has held up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nella S

customer_reviews.title: A skeptic turned Believer
customer_reviews.text: So I was little skeptic about this product, but went ahead and purchased it anyway. Glad I did. My arms are getting the workout it needs. It's a bit cumbersome in the beginning, but once you get used to the right length, you'll rip the benefit of this product. I even use this while watching Game of Thrones 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to adjust and test to get correct position
customer_reviews.text: Great product only used one time so far but really could tell the difference afterwards
customer_reviews.author: dominick l fountain

customer_reviews.title: I believe to be a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: For me this product fits me perfectly. Sturdy and comfortable. Only thing it should come with, if you have slack in the neck strap, have a small sleeve to slide over it so that it does not flop around.
customer_reviews.author: jon crego

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong construction while remaining light. Although the clip is plastic, it seems plenty strong enough to hold for years. Excellent price, great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I've been exercising for over 30 years, and I always wondered if these things worked... they do, and this is a quality product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo Lindeloff

customer_reviews.title: Bends when in beast mode
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bar, but I bent the bar doing 135lb straight bar curls. Easily bent back to shape, but this will bent (contouring to your chest shape) when you go beast mode.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and I definitely feel like it's doing ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a massive stroke early Dec 2016. I ordered this to help him regain his strength. It's easy to use and I definitely feel like it's doing the job!
customer_reviews.author: LesaRock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks, you get a massive quick pump from it, it also has padding on the elbows
customer_reviews.author: Peej

customer_reviews.title: For now I'm pretty happy.
customer_reviews.text: For now I'm pretty happy...didn't use it much since when l'm doing curls it puts a lot of pressure in the abdominal section...I think a better design will prevent this by make sure to curve more the arm blaster plate...
customer_reviews.author: Yvon D.

customer_reviews.title: The band is strong and easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Actually strong. I'm 6'5 and the range of motion that this produces feels natural. The band is strong and easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A must have for my arm day workout. Straps offer a lot of variety for when you are working out with a taller person.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: An excellent quality arm blaster!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, sturdier than I had imagined it would be, which was nice. The strap is adjustable and could probably fit the majority of body types. It comes in colors, and I got the yellow and black lettered one. Looks sharp in addition to being functional!
customer_reviews.author: Joeagain

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The webbing material was extremely thin. Had a seamstress add better quality webbing
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as advertized. Too bad the neck strap padding is such garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for about a week, but it seems pretty good. The padding on the strap, it kind of a cheap waste, and won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Item is well made and is adjustable. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is well made and is adjustable. It was a bit stiff and will need to be broken in over time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cafee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up quick and flawlessly greatly packaged and works amazing would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very comfortable and sturdy. And it really helps you focus in on the targeted muscle groups. I highly recommend to anyone who is wanting to take their arm exercises to the next level!
customer_reviews.author: MamaHancock

customer_reviews.title: Great pump 👌
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Strong build with good amount of padding. Gloss finish looks legit. Would recommend to any home gym or accessory for bigger arms!
customer_reviews.author: daniel shoup

customer_reviews.title: Save your money lol..
customer_reviews.text: Probably could be a good product the plastic piece that holds the adjusting strap is cheap and poorly made wouldn't even hold five pounds of pressure for myself other people might have better luck the one I got was sent straight back, and besides the product sucking the company will send you countless emails begging you to change your review, I suggest looking around spend money on something a little bit more higher quality it would be worth it in the long run...and to the company spending an extra $0.05 that it probably cost to make in China and get it made right
customer_reviews.author: Joseph PATE

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6 feet tall and weigh 290 pounds.. it’s just too small and fits uncomfortably
customer_reviews.author: SAMUEL RUSHING

customer_reviews.title: how ever the sell stood up and fixed the problem and I am now fully satisfied with my purchase good value
customer_reviews.text: I rated this one before and I was luke warm about it ....how ever the seller stood up and fixed the problem and I am now fully satisfied with my purchase good value....no flex .....fair price....
customer_reviews.author: Easygoer1

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to adjust the length of the strap
customer_reviews.text: The product is made out of durable material, I use it almost everyday and haven't had any issues so far. Super simple to adjust the length of the strap. really helps get that final big squeeze at the and of the motion. Over all great product and extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this is amazing. I have already started to see gains with only a few uses. While at the gym the, I catch everyone looking at me while I am using it. Daily, people ask me what it is and how my arms are so blasted. Immediately, I refer them to pick up the RAD ARM BLASTER from Amazon A$AP!
customer_reviews.author: A.Solano

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The arm blaster isolates my biceps very well. I am able to do less weight and receive more burn. I have increased my standard bicep curl by 20 lbs in just three weeks using the blaster twice a week!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Love how its easy to adjust the strap as well as how comfortable it is. Tried it yesterday and i have to say the pump was off the charts... my biceps were sore the next day which is always good. I encourage others to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Straps are cheap and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Straps are cheap and the adjustable clip broke right out of the box. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Really good accessory to have
customer_reviews.text: Really good accessory to have. Isolates the biceps perfectly and helps if you wanna increase the weights more than you'd usually do, since the elbows are fixed in place. Also the size of the arm blaster is optimal. I have pretty broud shoulders and didn't find any problems in terms of length. Definitely recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, nothing great
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little wider. Those with smaller arms it may be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyinpink

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty impressed with the materials and workmanship put into this
customer_reviews.text: Quality item. I was pretty impressed with the materials and workmanship put into this. Totally worth the few extra dollars over the other arm blasters on Amazon. Really enjoy using this!
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: THE CLIP IS NOT STRONG ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: Product works decently with light weight. The strap slips out of the clip too much when i put on medium and heavy weight which brings the plate down past my elbows and ruining my set. It would be better if the clip was replaced with a belt type concept.
customer_reviews.author: Caulan jackson

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY STURDY!!! The product also flexes very well to provide comfort. This product allows me to curls 100 lbs.+ while maintaining form to isolate my biceps.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cooper

customer_reviews.title: decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: decent for the price, match the body shape , belt is comfortable, as for durability will see
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about a month and have had no issues with it. Works great dos the job and more!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah&Vanessa Gatica

customer_reviews.title: Great Arm Workout!
customer_reviews.text: This Arm Blaster is exactly as described. It is a solid piece of metal that really allows you to get a great pump on. You won't be able to cheat on your form at all and it really gets you tired fast. I would definitely recommend it to anyone taking their bicep training seriously. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Great metal frame. Seems sturdy and looks like it will last. Only complaint I have is the neck padding could be softer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fast but as soon I opened it one ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast but as soon I opened it one of the rubber elbow pads on the left side were missing. Clue stains on it but no pad. Looked through the box and bag thinking it might of fell off and I would clue it back on but nope. It was packaged with out the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pumps, Helps immensely when training with scoliosis
customer_reviews.text: Gives a great pump. And due to the fact that I have scoliosis, maintaining a balanced form has always been a problem but I no longer have that problem thanks to this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Not a very comfortable fit. I have an old arm blaster from 20 years ago but was trying to upgrade. The old arm blaster feels much more comfortable versus this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars-works as designed
customer_reviews.text: this product works as it is designed. the only downside I had using it, was using it the day after chest and tris, and it presses up against your triceps and it hurts but you fight through it. its not the designs fault, it is just because my triceps are sore. I'm currently attempting to play around with where it sits on my chest to see if I can relieve it. but just a few weeks worth of bicep work, and it has definitely made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha corkins

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find these in a brick and mortar store. Like the finish and works as I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Steger

customer_reviews.title: Good, arm blaster works!
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time, I've used it and it works great. I feel like it's more for people without a gut because my workout partner has a hard time curling with it since he has a big stomach. Other than that it works great and you feel the difference once you compare it to sets without the arm blaster.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: The RAD Arm Blaster has been a great addition to my bicep routine
customer_reviews.text: The RAD Arm Blaster has been a great addition to my bicep routine. I've used it doing a variety of curls (dumbell curls, hammer curls, barbell curls) and thought it worked great. It is comfortable to wear and has held up to my workouts. Plus it left me with a bicep bulging pump!
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is money, Arnold knew what he was doing using a bicep blaster. Great iso and hella pump no bitches about this product whatsoever!.
customer_reviews.author: LTO

customer_reviews.title: I can't really say as I didn't use it, ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say as I didn't use it, but my son in law picked this for his xmas gift and was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Boda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall a solid product my only complaint would be that the strap is a bit thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: I shopped around and found RAD had a great price, placed my order & it quickly arrived
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to make thr investment into the armblaster. So, I shopped around and found RAD had a great price, placed my order & it quickly arrived! Can't wait to see the results!
customer_reviews.author: Mo in LBC

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Have purchased other arm blasters that broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Have purchased other arm blasters that broke within a few weeks, this one feels really solid. Good straps and comfortable on the neck...love the rounded ends. All around solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: I've signigicantly improved the amount of bicep curls
customer_reviews.text: I've signigicantly improved the amount of bicep curls i can perform at the gym. I went from curling 30s to now curling 45s. I perform 4 sets of 15 with 30 lb weights before bed every night. I would recommend This piece to everyone looking to improve their bicept strength
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marable

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: With this product, you can definitely isolate your biceps for a better pump. This product will leave you sore

customer_reviews.text: Quite effective. Neck pad is trash. Couldn't be thinner. Why? Otherwise a good product.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: The arm blaster is perfect for getting the optimal form for curls dumbbells and barbells. The neck sling is as comfortable as it need to be and easy to adjust. You find a better device like this for a better price.

customer_reviews.title: Best Arm Blaster
customer_reviews.text: I use this arm blaster every arm day and I love it. The pumps are INSANELY INTENSE! Its near impossible to cheat reps even when you're tired. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to increase arm size!

customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use it multiple times a week! I would recommend this to everyone I know! It definitely has been added to my weekly workout routines

product_meta.title: RAD Arm Blaster for Biceps & Triceps, Arm Workout Bicep Curl Support, Bicep Blaster, Bicep Isolator Weight Lifting Equipment.
feature_bullets: CONTOURED DESIGN: 24'' long arm blaster bicep isolator to support curl bar & preserve optimal form while doing heavy bicep curls and dumbbells.
ADJUSTABLE STRAP: The heavy duty Plastic buckle allows flexibility & fitment to maintain a proper posture according to all individual body types while isolating the arms.
NEOPRENE & FOAM PADDED: The arms blaster has neoprene padding to rest against the neck to avoid rashes. Also, the aluminium is foam padded to rest the arms with ease.
MAXIMUM QUALITY AT A MINIMUM PRICE: We bet you would not be able to find a biceps blaster at this price in the fitness market. We profit less so that you can save more.
LIFETIME WARRANTY!!! This is a top level arm building bicep isolator bar which will not bend or break.
